name: Gisum - Talesh
description: Gisum (Persian: گيسوم, also Romanized as Gīsūm; also known as Gīsom and Gīsūm-e Bālā)[1] is a village in Khaleh Sara Rural District, Asalem District, Talesh County, Gilan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 218, in 44 families.[2]   [wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gisum)
